issue.title: [CI] Travis OSX failing to install sdk headers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6987](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6987). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```java

sudo installer -pkg /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/Packages/macOS_SDK_headers_for_macOS_10.14.pkg -target /343installer: Package name is macOS_SDK_headers_for_macOS_10.14344installer: Certificate used to sign package is not trusted. Use -allowUntrusted to override.345The command "$TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/ci/travis_before_script_cpp.sh --only-library --homebrew" failed and exited with 1 during .
```
See <https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/602434884#L342-L345>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6987?focusedCommentId=16962652) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5756
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5756>
